DOC.brief_summary: This study design test effect six 5 minute microbursts physical activity spread across day compare either sedentary control condition single 30 minute bout moderate intensity physical activity cognitive function , self-reported energy level , aspect eat behavior measure metabolic health . The primary hypothesis : 1 . Hourly 5 minute bout moderate intensity exercise day increase afternoon cognitive function compare exercise condition . 2 . Hourly 5 minute bout moderate intensity exercise day increase afternoon cognitive function single 30 minute AM bout . Secondary exploratory hypothesis include 1 . Hourly 5 minute bout moderate intensity exercise day increase self-reported energy level , reduce orexigenic appetitive measure improve measure metabolic health compare exercise condition . 2 . Hourly 5 minute bout moderate intensity exercise day increase self-reported energy level , reduce orexigenic appetitive measure improve measure metabolic health single 30 minute AM bout .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Frequent Interruptions Prolonged Sitting Self-perceived Levels Energy , Mood , Food Cravings Cognitive Function
DOC.criteria: 1 . All ethnic group gender 2 . Age : Lower age limit : 19 year ; Upper age limit : 45 year 3 . Bodymass Index : Lower BMI limit : 18.5 kg/m2 ; Upper BMI limit : 29.9 kg/m2 4 . Willing adhere caffeine restriction two 16 ounce beverage morning study day caffeine intake 12:00pm three study day 1 . History cardiovascular disease , include coronary artery disease , congestive heart failure , & unstable angina , uncontrolled hypertension ( > 140/90 mm Hg ) 2 . Currently smoke stop smoke last 6 month 3 . Medications affect weight , energy intake , energy expenditure last 6 month 4 . Use oral steroid 5 . History stroke seizure , thyroid disease , type 1 2 diabetes , Cushing 's syndrome , cerebrovascular , renal disease , hepatic disease , arrhythmias 6 . Cancer require treatment past 5 year , exception skin cancer melanoma 7 . Infectious disease : Selfreported HIV positivity active tuberculosis 8 . Inability exercise 30 minute treadmill moderate intensity 9 . Currently pregnant , lactate less 6 month postpartum 10 . History major psychiatric disorder include schizophrenia , bipolar illness psychotic depression 11 . Score > 25 Beck Depression Inventory 12 . No recreational drug use include marijuana past 1 year
